metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8478 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Qualcomm video driver couldenable a local malicious application to access data outside of itspermission levels. This issue is rated as Moderate because it firstrequires compromising a privileged process. Product: Android. Versions:Kernel-3.18. Android ID: A-32511270. References: QC-CR#1088206.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
